embeds.title: Barrack Building
embeds.description:
• A strong army often relies on high troops count. A 9-load troops (such as Undead Soldier) is often preferred over a single-load troops (such as Ogre Warriors) due to higher __combined__ health and attack power.
• 9-load long-range troops are notoriously difficult to obtain. On average, a player needs about __17M__ coins to obtain a level 8 Archers through 240k packs, and __82M__ coins to obtain a level 8 Peltasts and a level 8 Taurus Witchers through 120k packs. New players are encouraged to focus on buying 240k packs to obtain at least 7 level-8 Archers/Taurus Witchers before switching to 120k packs.

embeds.title: 240k packs
embeds.description:
• Many Common and Rare troops form the the __backbone__ of a strong formation, and the best way to obtain them is through the 30× troops pack purchases.
• On the Home Screen, a player can tap the Recruitment Camp icon and obtain 30× common/rare troops for 240k gold coins (216k with ᴠɪᴘ)

embeds.title: 120k packs
embeds.description:
• After acquiring plenty of base troops, a player can start focusing on Epic and Legendary troops, and the best way to obtain them is through 4-star troops purchases.
• On the Battle Screen, a player can tap the Troops Card icon to obtain Epic troops via 4-star troops purchases. When the Lucky Meter fills up, a player also has a chance to obtain Epic or Legendary troops through Lucky Time.
